report.name: facting1

userParameter.name: P_WHERE
userParameter.initialValue: from synthese_fin sf, client_mo cli, ligne_bip bip, centre_activite ca, datdebex d where bip.PID = sf.PID and bip.CLICODE = cli.CLICODE and sf.CODCAMO = ca.CODCAMO and sf.ANNEE = to_char(d.MOISMENS,'YYYY')
userParameter.label: P Where

dataSource.name: Q_DATDEBEX
dataSource.select: select to_char(:p_MoisConso) || '/' || to_char(:p_AnConso) dc_mois, :p_AnConso dc_an, (:p_AnConso - 1) dc_dec from dual;

dataSource.name: Q_CA
dataSource.select: select decode(:FIXE_2, 'MO', ca.CLIBRCA|| sf.CODCAMO, ''||sf.CODCAMO ) dc_tri, sf.CODCAMO dc_ca, sf.CAFI dc_numrub, cli.CLISIGLE dc_mo, cli.CLICODE dc_cdmo, ca.CLIBRCA dc_libca, bip.TYPPROJ dc_type, bip.PID dc_pid, substr(bip.PNOM,1,28) dc_libelle, bip.METIER || '-' || pack_utile.f_get_deppole_codsg( sf.CODSG ) dc_dpg, substr(ca.CLIBRCA,6,3) dc_dept, sum(nvl(sf.D_CONSOFTSG_FI,0) + nvl(sf.D_CONSOFTSSII_FI,0) + nvl(sf.D_CONSOENVSG_NI,0) + nvl(sf.D_CONSOENVSSII_NI,0))/1000 dc_dec_1_NA, sum(nvl(sf.D_CONSOENVSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.D_CONSOENVSSII_IM,0))/1000 dc_dec_1_A, sum(nvl(sf.CONSOFTSG_FI,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOFTSSII_FI,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOENVSG_NI,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOENVSSII_NI,0))/1000 dc_total_fi_NA, sum(nvl(sf.CONSOENVSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOENVSSII_IM,0))/1000 dc_total_fi_A, sum(nvl(sf.A_CONSOFT_FI,0) + nvl(sf.A_CONSOENV_NI,0))/1000 dc_rectif_mois_NA, sum(nvl(sf.A_CONSOENV_IM,0))/1000 dc_rectif_mois_A, sum(nvl(sf.M_CONSOFTSG_FI,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOFTSSII_FI,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOENVSG_NI,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOENVSSII_NI,0))/1000 dc_fi_mois_NA, sum(nvl(sf.M_CONSOENVSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOENVSSII_IM,0))/1000 dc_fi_mois_A &P_WHERE group by sf.CODCAMO, sf.CAFI, cli.CLISIGLE, cli.CLICODE, ca.CLIBRCA, bip.TYPPROJ, bip.PID, substr(bip.PNOM,1,28), bip.METIER || '-' || pack_utile.f_get_deppole_codsg( sf.CODSG ), substr(ca.CLIBRCA,6,3) &P_ORDERBY;

dataDescriptor.expression: sum ( nvl ( sf.D_CONSOFTSG_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.D_CONSOFTSSII_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.D_CONSOENVSG_NI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.D_CONSOENVSSII_NI , 0 ) ) / 1000
sum ( nvl ( sf.CONSOFTSG_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.CONSOFTSSII_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.CONSOENVSG_NI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.CONSOENVSSII_NI , 0 ) ) / 1000
sum ( nvl ( sf.M_CONSOFTSG_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.M_CONSOFTSSII_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.M_CONSOENVSG_NI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.M_CONSOENVSSII_NI , 0 ) ) / 1000

dataSource.name: Q_direction
dataSource.select: select substr(cli.clisigle,1,4) dc_direction, sum(nvl(sf.D_CONSOFTSG_FI,0) + nvl(sf.D_CONSOFTSSII_FI,0) + nvl(sf.D_CONSOENVSG_NI,0) + nvl(sf.D_CONSOENVSSII_NI,0) + nvl(sf.D_CONSOENVSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.D_CONSOENVSSII_IM,0))/1000 dc_dir_dec, sum(nvl(sf.CONSOFTSG_FI,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOFTSSII_FI,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOENVSG_NI,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOENVSSII_NI,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOENVSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOENVSSII_IM,0))/1000 dc_dir_total_fi, sum(nvl(sf.A_CONSOFT_FI,0) + nvl(sf.A_CONSOENV_NI,0) + nvl(sf.A_CONSOENV_IM,0))/1000 dc_dir_rectif_mois, sum(nvl(sf.M_CONSOFTSG_FI,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOFTSSII_FI,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOENVSG_NI,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOENVSSII_NI,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOENVSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOENVSSII_IM,0))/1000 dc_dir_fi_mois &P_WHERE group by substr(cli.clisigle,1,4);

dataDescriptor.expression: sum ( nvl ( sf.D_CONSOFTSG_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.D_CONSOFTSSII_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.D_CONSOENVSG_NI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.D_CONSOENVSSII_NI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.D_CONSOENVSG_IM , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.D_CONSOENVSSII_IM , 0 ) ) / 1000

sum ( nvl ( sf.CONSOFTSG_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.CONSOFTSSII_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.CONSOENVSG_NI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.CONSOENVSSII_NI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.CONSOENVSG_IM , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.CONSOENVSSII_IM , 0 ) ) / 1000
sum ( nvl ( sf.A_CONSOFT_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.A_CONSOENV_NI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.A_CONSOENV_IM , 0 ) ) / 1000

sum ( nvl ( sf.M_CONSOFTSG_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.M_CONSOFTSSII_FI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.M_CONSOENVSG_NI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.M_CONSOENVSSII_NI , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.M_CONSOENVSG_IM , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.M_CONSOENVSSII_IM , 0 ) ) / 1000

textSegment.string: Attention : Primtre trop grand Veuiller contacter la MO BIP

function.name: afterpform
